The claim made by Sen: Dianne Feinstein that "no poll done this year shows less than a majority to reinstate a federal ban on assault weapons."
The fact that Sen: Feinstein proposed the Assault Weapons Ban of 2013, which was a renewal and expansion of the original ban.
The analysis of 18 polls conducted betwe: 9 and April 7, which included questions about assault weapons and their support or opposition to a ban.
